overview: Em and Jess find themselves stuck in a constant death loop, with seemingly no escape. Every evening Jess takes her own life, and every morning she awakens physically unscathed. With no possibility of escape, Em must either find a way to break the cycle and keep her alive, or learn to let go and finally grieve for her lost love.
tagline: In the end, we all have to let go
title: Hold Me Till The End
